bs-prodistributionconnector-desc: Connects BlueSpice to various MediaWiki extensions
bs-pro-distribution-droplet-pro-con-list: Table for comparing pros and cons
bs-pro-distribution-droplet-modal-dialog: Configurable button which opens a customizable modal dialogue
bs-pro-distribution-droplet-decision-des: Highlights a decision as a page property
bs-pro-distribution-instance-status-numb: There {{PLURAL:$1|is '''$1''' registered active user|are '''$1''' registered active users}}. No known limit set.
There {{PLURAL:$1|is '''$1''' registered active user|are '''$1''' registered active users}}. The number of users is unlimited.
There {{PLURAL:$1|is '''$1''' registered active user|are '''$1''' registered active users}} ($3%). The number of users is limited to $2.

There {{PLURAL:$1|is '''$1''' registered active user|are '''$1''' registered active users}}. Maximum number of users is reached! Please contact the BlueSpice team to increase the number of allowed users or disable some of the existing users in order to be able to create new users.
bs-pro-distribution-createaccount-fail-m: The maximum number of accounts has been exceeded
bs-pro-distribution-pdfembed-inspector-i: Select PDF file from the wiki to include it in the wikipage
bs-pro-distribution-pdfembed-inspector-w: Set width of PDF preview. Leave empty for using the default size of 800px
bs-pro-distribution-pdfembed-inspector-h: Set height of PDF preview. Leave empty for using the default size of 1090px
bs-pro-distribution-pdfembed-inspector-p: Number of page which will be displayed after rendering of preview
bs-pro-distribution-pdfembed-droplet-des: Embed preview of PDF file in wikipage
bs-pro-distribution-config-link-titles-p: On save, analyze the content of the page and link to the pages mentioned in the content
When rendering a page, analyze the content and link to the pages mentioned in the content. This will not alter the content of the page
bs-pro-distribution-config-link-titles-s: Only analyze pages in these namespaces
bs-pro-distribution-config-link-titles-t: Only link to pages in these namespaces
bs-pro-distribution-config-link-titles-s: Only link to pages in the same namespace as the source page
bs-pro-distribution-droplet-embed-desc: Embed external content from Git repositories, eg. markdown files
bs-pro-distribution-droplets-ec-embed-la: One of the [https://prismjs.com/#supported-languages supported languages]. Only necessary if the language is not detected from the file extension.
bs-pro-distribution-droplets-ec-embed-sh: Show only specific lines. It can be a single line number or a range separated with a hyphen (-). Multiple line numbers or ranges can be separated by commas.
bs-pro-distribution-ec-config-file-white: List of allowed file extensions. Leave empty to have no restriction.
bs-pro-distribution-ec-config-domain-whi: List of allowed domains to embed content from. Do not include the protocol, just the domain. Eg. `github.com`. Leave empty to have no restriction.
